author: Lee Seiu Kin J:
casename: Pan United Marine Ltd v Chief Assessor

tags-parsed: Revenue Law/Property tax/Annual value/Assessment/Floating dry docks not located in property but on seabed not within boundaries of property/Sole access to floating dry docks by ramp from property/Whether floating dry docks assessable as part of land of property/Section 2(1) Property Tax Act (Cap 254, 1997 Rev Ed)
